strength.scenario: A small boulder blocks a narrow passage. You need to move it aside.
strength.success_message: You easily push the boulder out of the way!
strength.failure_message: The boulder is heavier than it looks and won't budge.

strength.scenario: Heavy iron bars block a doorway. You must bend them to pass.
strength.success_message: With great effort, you bend the bars enough to squeeze through!
strength.failure_message: The iron bars are too strong for you to bend.

strength.scenario: A massive stone door is stuck shut and requires great force to open.
strength.success_message: You strain against the door and it slowly grinds open!
strength.failure_message: Despite your best efforts, the door remains sealed.

strength.scenario: Ancient chains bind a treasure chest. You need to break them.
strength.success_message: The chains snap under your powerful grip!
strength.failure_message: The ancient chains are too strong to break with bare hands.

strength.scenario: A deep pit requires you to climb up using only your grip strength.
strength.success_message: Your powerful grip carries you up the sheer wall!
strength.failure_message: Your grip fails and you slide back down the pit wall.

intelligence.scenario: Simple symbols cover the wall. You must decipher their basic meaning.
intelligence.success_message: The symbols reveal a simple message about safe passage!
intelligence.failure_message: The symbols remain meaningless to you.

intelligence.scenario: A mechanical puzzle with gears and levers blocks your way forward.
intelligence.success_message: You understand the mechanism and activate it correctly!

intelligence.scenario: Ancient runes glow with power. You need to understand their pattern.
intelligence.success_message: You recognize the runic pattern and activate its power!
intelligence.failure_message: The runic pattern is too complex for you to understand.

intelligence.scenario: A riddle is carved in stone, written in an ancient language.
intelligence.success_message: Your knowledge of ancient languages reveals the riddle's answer!
intelligence.failure_message: The ancient language is beyond your understanding.

intelligence.scenario: Multiple levers control a complex mechanism. You must determine the correct sequence.
intelligence.success_message: You calculate the perfect sequence and the mechanism activates!

dexterity.scenario: A few pressure plates cover part of the floor. You must step carefully.
dexterity.success_message: You carefully avoid the pressure plates!
dexterity.failure_message: You accidentally trigger a pressure plate!

dexterity.scenario: A narrow ledge spans a small gap. You need good balance.
dexterity.success_message: You gracefully cross the narrow ledge!
dexterity.failure_message: You lose your balance and stumble.

dexterity.scenario: Spinning blades block the passage. You must time your movement precisely.
dexterity.success_message: You slip through the spinning blades with perfect timing!
dexterity.failure_message: The spinning blades catch you as you try to pass.

dexterity.scenario: A complex lock requires delicate manipulation to open.
dexterity.success_message: Your nimble fingers work the lock mechanism perfectly!
dexterity.failure_message: The delicate lock mechanism is too complex for your fingers.

dexterity.scenario: Swinging pendulums guard the exit. You need to slip through at the perfect moment.
dexterity.success_message: You time your movement perfectly and slip through unharmed!
dexterity.failure_message: The pendulums knock you back as you try to pass.

luck.scenario: Two identical doors stand before you. One leads forward, one leads back.
luck.success_message: Fortune smiles upon you - you chose the correct door!
luck.failure_message: Bad luck - you chose the wrong door and must backtrack.

luck.scenario: A magical wheel spins with various symbols. You must choose when to stop it.
luck.success_message: The wheel stops on a favorable symbol!
luck.failure_message: The wheel stops on an unlucky symbol.

luck.scenario: Ancient dice lie on a pedestal. The gods will judge your fortune.
luck.success_message: The dice show a blessed combination!
luck.failure_message: The dice show an cursed result.

luck.scenario: A shimmering portal flickers unstably. You must time your entry perfectly.
luck.success_message: You enter the portal at just the right moment!
luck.failure_message: The portal destabilizes as you enter, causing harm.

luck.scenario: Five treasure chests sit before you, but only one contains what you need.
luck.success_message: Against all odds, you choose the correct chest!
luck.failure_message: Your choice leads to disappointment and danger.
